subject: New machine in build_farm - "bigboy"
body:
I finally found and fixed the hardware problems that were keeping
"bigboy" from participating in the build farm. It should be ok now.  Any
questions about it should be addressed to me.

The machine is a Dell XPS T500 Pentium II (500 MHz) running Ubuntu
GNU/Linux 6.06.1. I have installed all of the previously-released
patches.

Thanks,
PG
